extension.description: Automatically organizes and formats JavaScript/TypeScript imports with support for MUI optimization, import grouping, and unused import removal
command.toggleFormatOnSave: Order Import: Toggle Format on Save
command.toggleFormatOnSave.description: Enable or disable automatic import organization when saving files
command.selectNormal.description: Organize imports by name length with single space before 'from'
command.selectAligned.description: Organize imports alphabetically with aligned 'from' keywords
command.toggleMuiOptimization.descriptio: Enable or disable Material-UI import optimization for better tree-shaking
command.organizeImports.description: Manually organize imports in the active editor
config.organizeOnSave.description: Automatically organize imports when saving files
config.formatStyle.description: Choose import formatting style: 'normal' (by length) or 'aligned' (alphabetically with aligned 'from')
config.muiOptimization.description: Optimize Material-UI imports for better tree-shaking (converts barrel imports to direct component imports)
config.groupByType.description: Group imports by type (external, path aliases, relative) with blank lines between groups
config.pathAliases.description: List of path aliases used in your project (e.g., '@/', '~/', '@components/')
config.removeUnusedImports.description: Automatically remove imports that are not used in the code
message.formatOnSave.enabled: Order Import: Format on save ENABLED
message.formatOnSave.disabled: Order Import: Format on save DISABLED
